allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: SaungWA integration ENUM status mismatch

- Add ''gagal'' status to pesan_wa ENUM \(belum_kirim, success, gagal\)
- Update PesanWaService to use correct status values
- Add webhook endpoint for SaungWA callbacks
- Add saungwa log channel for debugging

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add: SaungWA webhook endpoint for receiving callbacks

- Create /api/webhook/saungwa endpoint
- Add SaungwaWebhookController to handle incoming webhooks
- Register API routes in bootstrap/app.php
- Add saungwa log channel for webhook debugging

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: WA status update dan Dashboard real-time

Bug fixes:
- Fix status_wa value mismatch \(sent vs success\)
- Update Dashboard to show all peserta without paket filter
- Update status badge classes untuk nilai ENUM yang benar
- Update view labels untuk status WA

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Add table names to models and simplify DatabaseSeeder

- Add $table property to Package, Company, Participant, Upload, WaMessage models
- Map English model names to Indonesian table names \(paket, instansi, peserta, unggahan, pesan_wa\)
- Remove broken seeders that reference non-existent tables
- Keep only AdminUserSeeder in DatabaseSeeder

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
